definition: inclining to the west (e.g. of the sun after noon, indicating lateness of the day)
to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: A city of central Germany on the Elbe River west-southwest of Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 德國中部一個城市，位於柏林西南偏西易北河畔。

sentences.english: FITOW moved WNW in the past 24 hours with slight weakening.
sentences.chinese: 菲特於過去24小時向西北偏西移動並稍爲減弱。

sentences.english: A city of south-central Poland west-northwest of Katowice.
sentences.chinese: 波蘭中南部一城市，位於卡托維茲西北偏西。

sentences.english: A city of west-central Pakistan west-southwest of Lahore .
sentences.chinese: 基達巴基斯坦中西部一城市，位於拉合爾西南偏西。

sentences.english: A city of northwest-central Yugoslavia northwest of Sarajevo.
sentences.chinese: 南斯拉夫中部偏西北一城市，位於薩拉熱窩西北。

sentences.english: A city of northwest Belgium on the North Sea west-southwest of Bruges.
sentences.chinese: 比利時西北城市，位於布魯日西南偏西，瀕臨北海。

sentences.english: PEIPAH is now predominantly steered by the subtropical ridge ENE of it , inducing a WNW movement.
sentences.chinese: 琵琶正沿副熱帶高壓脊的西南部向西北偏西方向移動。

sentences.english: The frequency is large with the westerly wind but small with the northeasterly wind in southern Fujian.
sentences.chinese: 閩南地區在偏西風下的酸雨出現率大，東北風下最小。

sentences.english: A city of west-central Saudi Arabia on the Red Sea.
sentences.chinese: 吉達沙特阿拉伯中部偏西城市，位於紅海沿岸。

sentences.english: A village of northern France west - northwest of Arras.
sentences.chinese: 阿金庫爾法國北部阿哈西北偏西的一個村莊。

definition: west/west side/western part/to the west of
east/east side/eastern part/to the east of
color of the sky/time of day, as indicated by the color of the sky/weather
south/south side/southern part/to the south of
north/north side/northern part/to the north of
11 am-1 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
